subject: Re: [junit] While writing ejb test clients..
msgSnippet: ... One ought /never/ to rely on finalize() to do anything important. Even the designers of the Java language have admitted that finalize() was a bad idea. --
messageBody:
Seshu N wrote:

> Hi Karthik,
> Probably we can do it in the finalize method, put that also in the test
> suit. I haven't tested this, but it must work.
> Wants to know more about it. :->

One ought /never/ to rely on finalize() to do anything important. Even
the designers of the Java language have admitted that finalize() was a
bad idea.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
